name: Chroma Saturn
description:
Made for the AGD Slam Jam 2022

Theme: Oversaturated

Mutator: COME ON AND SLAM

A Vaporwave themed rhythm game where you take control of Muse and defend yourself against waves of BEATS in time with the music.

6 lanes with 6 buttons. Customisable controls and a mini-game to calibrate your latency.

Currently: 1 level with more planned.

Credits:

Programming/Design: Adam Schmidt (Twitter)

3D and 2D Art Assets: Alexander Cruz (Twitter)

Level Music: Artemis Bishop (Instagram)

Music and SFX: Jarrod Matulick
